articles.summary: Asda has launched a new 'Asda Express' store in Castleford, offering a range of groceries, beverages, and services such as a Costa Coffee machine, ATM, and Amazon collections/returns. The store, located at the former New Airedale pub site, also provides on-demand food delivery options via Uber Eats, Just Eat, and Deliveroo as well as electronic shelf edge labels.

articles.title: Tyra Banks' Bizarre New Ice Cream Product Has The Internet Confused
articles.author: Parade
articles.summary: Tyra Banks' SMiZE and Dream in Sydney has launched "Hot Ice Cream," a warm, pourable, sip-friendly dessert. The debut flavor, "Hot Mama," features toasted pecans and caramel butter and was available for a limited time from September 26 through October 3 at their flagship store.

articles.title: 5 things foldable phones can do that others can't
articles.author: Oluwaseyifunmi Awobiyi
articles.summary: Foldable phones from brands like Samsung, Google, and Huawei are emerging as serious alternatives to traditional smartphones, offering unique features. These devices provide benefits such as seamless application adaptation, enhanced multitasking capabilities with split-screen functionality, and the ability to take high-quality selfies using rear cameras via external displays. Also they have the ability to transform from a phone to a tablet.

articles.title: Say It, Edit It – AI Edit Genie rules your gallery with realme 15 Series Party Revolution
articles.author: Staff Reporter
articles.summary: realme is launching the realme 15 Series smartphones on October 13. The series features a new AI Edit Genie for effortless photo editing and a Triple 50MP AI Camera. The realme 15 Series includes realme 15, realme 15 Pro, and realme 15T models.

articles.title: Rise of AI-powered marketing agencies and the ‘AI artist'
articles.author: BE Staff
articles.summary: LTI Mindtree launched Blueverse CraftStudio, an AI-powered studio designed for the modern enterprise. It aims to reimagine content creation, personalization, and scaling for marketing purposes. The studio is betting on a future where marketing is built on AI.

articles.title: Asda shoppers say 'size of that' after spotting 'giant' on shelf
articles.author: Andrew Nuttall
articles.summary: Asda has launched a giant pink doughnut in its bakery section, priced at £1.38. The doughnut is currently only available in-store and not for online orders. Asda is also introducing digital tags in selected Express stores.

articles.title: Prime Big Deal Days 2025: Best deals on Amazon US, including tech, kitchen, home, and beauty
articles.author: Lm Us Desk
articles.summary: Amazon is holding its Prime Big Deal Days, offering exclusive deals to Prime members. The 48-hour event includes discounted products across categories such as electronics, home goods, and apparel, featuring brands like Samsung, Ninja, Adidas, and Barbie. Some featured product deals include the Samsung Jet 75 Complete Cordless Stick Vacuum Cleaner, Ninja Blast Portable Blender, and Barbie Hot Wheels RC SUV.

articles.title: Syncron™ Debuts as Next-Generation Beverage Brand, Launching Pre- and Post-Workout Drinks with Shohei Ohtani
articles.author: PR Newswire
articles.summary: Syncron, a performance and hydration beverage brand, launched Pre- and Post-Workout drinks in collaboration with Shohei Ohtani. The sugar-free, plant-forward drinks are available in select retailers in Southern California, and will expand to Arizona, Nevada and Utah. They are also available online at livesyncron.com and on Amazon.

articles.title: Syncron™ Debuts as Next-Generation Beverage Brand, Launching Pre- and Post-Workout Drinks with Shohei Ohtani
articles.author: Syncron
articles.summary: A new performance brand is launching functional beverages. These beverages are designed to fuel, recover, and thrive, suggesting enhanced performance benefits.

articles.title: Dovetail Launches AI-First Customer Intelligence Platform to Power Customer-Led Product Development
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Dovetail launched its customer intelligence platform in Fall 2025. This AI-native system transforms customer feedback into real-time intelligence. Dovetail also announced a partnership with Alloy, a collaborative prototyping platform, to enable direct conversion of feedback into working prototypes.

articles.title: Dovetail Launches AI-First Customer Intelligence Platform to Power Customer-Led Product Development
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Dovetail launched its customer intelligence platform in Fall 2025, an AI-native system designed to transform customer feedback into real-time intelligence. This platform integrates with Alloy, Salesforce, Linear, and Gong, aiming to eliminate product development bottlenecks by structuring customer signals into actionable requirements for coding and prototyping.

articles.title: Poppik Lifestyle Pvt. Ltd. to Officially Launch on 10th October 2025 - Ushering in a New Era of Beauty & Lifestyle in India
articles.author: Uniindia News Service
articles.summary: Poppik Lifestyle Pvt. Ltd. is launching its beauty and lifestyle brand on October 10th, 2025. The brand aims to offer high-quality, affordable beauty products to Indian consumers, focusing on skincare and cosmetics that are dermatologically tested and cruelty-free. The launch lineup will feature a range of products designed for modern, aspirational consumers.

articles.title: Google's ‘Try On' Feature Arrives in Canada—See How Clothes Look on You Instantly
articles.author: John Quintet
articles.summary: Google has launched its AI-powered 'Try On' tool in Canada, enabling shoppers to virtually try on clothes before buying. This feature, available across Google Search, Google Shopping, and Google Images, uses AI to show how different fabrics behave on real bodies, adapting the clothing to the user's uploaded image and allowing experimentation with sizes and colors.

articles.title: Nosto Announces Agentic Personalization Platform with Introduction of Huginn
articles.author: Nosto
articles.summary: Nosto launched Huginn, an AI agent designed to transform digital commerce for brands. Huginn is built around Nosto's Commerce Experience Platform. Nosto's Large Intent Model is fueling a new team of agents.

articles.title: Square Releases Delivers for Restaurants, With Square's Biggest Food & Beverage Platform Expansion To Date
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Square launched a significant expansion of its food and beverage platform as part of its biannual Square Releases product launch. This expansion includes innovations to help restaurants reach more customers, manage costs, and optimize operations.

articles.title: Rinse Launches Next Day Hang Dry Service to Protect Customers' Athleisure and Delicates
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Rinse, a laundry and dry cleaning delivery service, announced the nationwide rollout of its Next Day Hang Dry Service. This makes Rinse one of the only providers offering next-day turnaround for delicates and athleisure across all of its markets.

articles.title: Barclays issues response as customer confused over £900 payments
articles.author: Nicholas Dawson
articles.summary: Barclays is offering up to £900 in bonus cash to customers who switch to a Barclays Bank Account or a Premier Current Account via the Barclays app. The offer includes £400 for switching to a Premier account or £200 for switching to a Barclays Bank Account and signing up for Blue rewards. Additionally, customers can receive up to £500 for transferring their ISA savings to Barclays.

articles.title: Barclays explains how to navigate website to apply for £900 payments
articles.author: Nicholas Dawson
articles.summary: Barclays is offering bonus payments up to £900 for customers who switch to either a Barclays Bank Account or a Premier Current Account via the Barclays app. The offer includes £400 for switching to a Premier account or £200 for switching to a Barclays Bank Account and signing up for Blue rewards, with an additional £500 available for transferring ISA savings.

articles.title: Nivea 6-piece beauty gift set slashed to lowest EVER price of £9.50 for Prime Day
articles.author: Sophie Bates

The set includes six skincare and body care items. Additionally, Nivea's Wintervan gift set is reduced by 50% to £4.75 and includes four beauty products.

articles.title: Barclays explains exact process to claim £900 payments in the app
articles.author: Nicholas Dawson
articles.summary: Barclays is offering bonus cash when customers switch to either a Barclays Bank Account or a Premier Current Account, with up to £900 on offer. Customers need to complete the switch in the Barclays app to qualify, including bringing over at least two active direct debits. On top of either switch offer, customers can also get up to £500 when switching their ISA savings to Barclays.

articles.title: More than a showroom: LG and R&R redefine everyday living in Pakistan
articles.author: Maleeha Zahid
articles.summary: LG, in collaboration with R&R Industries, has launched a new showroom experience in Pakistan. The showroom features LG's complete product lineup, including home solutions like washing machines and media solutions like televisions. This launch represents LG's philosophy of human-centered innovation and aims to redefine daily living in Pakistan.

articles.title: Optable Announces Agentic Collaboration: Ushering in the Next Era of AI-Driven Adtech
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Optable has launched Agentic Collaboration, a platform that leverages AI-driven agents to automate and optimize adtech workflows. These agents can analyze data, generate insights, and activate campaigns autonomously. The new platform aims to democratize access to identity and audiences, making advertising more efficient.

articles.title: The Freeze-Dried Ice Cream Made for Hikes, Road Trips, and Beach Days

The freeze-dried process removes water, creating a light, crunchy snack in flavors like Strawberries & Cream, Raspberries & Blueberries, and Mangos & Cream that doesn't require refrigeration, making it suitable for outdoor activities and kids.

articles.title: OnePlus Is Launching Android 16 Update This Month

The update promises smoother animations, tighter security, AI-driven performance optimisation, revamped privacy controls, new notification layouts, lock screen widgets, and more flexible Quick Settings layouts.

articles.title: Amazon customers are disturbed by new Ring camera feature

AI also facilitates ongoing maintenance by scanning code for vulnerabilities and keeping documentation updated.

The contents are cruelty-free and vegan.

It will be available in Moonlight Silver and Sapphire Black.

articles.author: PR Newswire

articles.title: Reclaim Your Home's Aesthetics: Samsung Washer Dryers End the Era of Balcony Clotheslines
articles.summary: Samsung has launched the Bespoke AI Washer Dryer in Sri Lanka, a two-in-one appliance designed for modern urban spaces. The washer dryer features AI-powered intelligence, a 12KG wash and 7KG dry capacity, and is available at select distributors for Rs.229,999. It also includes features like AI EcoBubble, SmartThings App integration, and Digital Inverter Technology.

articles.title: SAP\u0027s AI-Powered Business Suite Ends the Best-of-Breed Era
articles.author: Al Bawaba
articles.summary: SAP SE showcased the integration of AI, data, and applications at its SAP Connect event. This integration aims to create unparalleled business value.

articles.title: Clean Aesthetic Meets Fragrance: The Minimalist Deos Everyone's Obsessed With (Regardless of Gender)
articles.author: Desh Gujarat
articles.summary: The article highlights the emergence of minimalist deodorants, which prioritize clean formulas, gender-neutral scents, and sustainable packaging. Brands like Native, Myro, Corpus, and Type:A offer new deodorant products using innovative ingredients, representing a shift towards transparency, sustainability, and effective personal care.

articles.title: SuperBuzz Reports Strong Two-Month Growth, Surging Customer Demand, and Path to Profitability
articles.author: Newsfile
articles.summary: SuperBuzz Inc. announced that its AI-driven SaaS platform has achieved a milestone with 1,090 new registrations and a 100% increase in paying subscribers. The platform optimizes user engagement and increases monetization efficiency through intelligent automation and predictive personalization. SuperBuzz expects to reach profitability in early 2026 due to the growth of its platform.

articles.title: AVON Launches the World's 1st Matte Lipstick with a Hyaluronic Core in India
articles.author: Sourav
articles.summary: AVON has launched its Hydramatic Matte Lipstick in India. The lipstick is a matte lipstick with a hydrating hyaluronic core, designed with skincare ingredients and SPF 20.

articles.title: Is Aryan Khan's The Ba***ds Of Bollywood The Most ‘Branded Netflix Show'? Fans Say ‘Keep Them…'
articles.author: Buzz Staff
articles.summary: Aryan Khan's luxury spirits label, D'YAVOL Spirits, was launched through a collaboration with Radico Khaitan Ltd. and Nikhil Kamath. It aims to combine liquid craftsmanship, disruptive design, and cultural relevance, beginning with a premium tequila set to launch by December 2025. The brand also has award-winning whiskies and vodka and a streetwear line.

articles.title: Shoppers Rejoice! Roborock's New F25 RT Lands in Aldi's Special Buys™ This October!  Oct. 8, 2025 05:00
articles.summary: Roborock is launching its F25 RT cleaning solution in ALDI stores for $299 starting October 8, 2025. The F25 RT features 20,000 Pa suction, FlatReach design, Dual JawScrapers, and a hot-water self-cleaning system. It is targeted towards families and pet owners and will be available in limited quantities.

articles.title: Ninja Gaiden 4: 10 Things You Should Know About The New Game
articles.author: Brian Mazique
articles.summary: Ninja Gaiden 4 is launching on October 21, 2025, for consoles and October 20 on Steam, available on PS5, Xbox Series X/S, and PC. The game introduces a new protagonist, Yakumo, while Ryu Hayabusa returns as a playable character, set in a cyberpunk Tokyo. Pre-orders are open, offering early access and exclusive DLC for Steam customers, with standard and deluxe digital editions, and physical copies available for PS5 and Xbox.

articles.title: Tesla offers cheaper version of its best-selling EV in bid to win back market share ...
articles.author: Morning Times
articles.summary: Tesla launched a new, cheaper version of its best-selling electric vehicle. This indicates an expansion of their product line with a more accessible option.

articles.title: Seattle tech vets Marco Matos and Kabir Shahani rethink marketing for big brands with new AI startup
articles.author: Taylor Soper
articles.summary: Adora, a new AI marketing technology startup, has launched a platform designed to help enterprise brands create and measure marketing content using AI.  The platform has assisted early adopters like Alaska Airlines and Brooks Running by improving return on ad spend. Adora leverages AI to generate on-brand ad variations for various channels, with a proprietary routing system that dynamically uses different large language and generative models.

articles.title: Google brings Opal AI app builder to India and 14 other countries
articles.author: Md Ijaj Khan
articles.summary: Google has expanded its experimental app-building tool, Opal, to 15 new countries, including India, Japan, Brazil, South Korea, and Canada. This expansion includes a new debugging feature and performance upgrades, allowing users to test and correct app workflows within the visual editor. Opal is part of Google's effort to make app development more accessible through artificial intelligence.

articles.title: Beijing Yunji Technology kicks off bookbuilding
articles.author: MARKET
articles.summary: Beijing Yunji Technology introduced a smart delivery robot.

articles.title: Amazon Prime Big Deal Days: Ninja Swirl Never Been Cheaper
articles.author: Rosalyn Fannin
articles.summary: Ninja has launched the Ninja Swirl ice cream maker in Australia, which was released in August 2025. Amazon is offering a discounted price of $439 during the Amazon Prime Big Deal Days, saving customers $110. The Ninja Swirl features 13 ice cream programs and utilizes Creamify technology.

articles.title: Fortune 500 Brands Double Return on Ad Spend Using Adora's "Speed-of-Culture" AI Platform
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Adora launched its end-to-end AI performance marketing engine at Advertising Week New York. The engine aims to enable Fortune 500 brands to activate revenue-driving campaigns quickly, addressing the decline in advertising returns.

articles.title: How to Clone a Hard Drive on Windows and Mac
articles.author: Palash Volvoikar
articles.summary: The article discusses the process of cloning hard drives, mentioning the Crucial P310 2280 NVMe SSD as an option when upgrading storage space. This SSD was installed in a ZikeDrive enclosure for the cloning process, providing a potential use case for the Crucial product.

articles.title: Tesla launches its long-awaited affordable EV, the Model Y Standard
articles.summary: Tesla has launched the Model Y Standard, a new entry-level version of its popular crossover, priced from $39,990 and initially available in the US. It is the most efficient Model Y, offering a US market range estimate of 517km, and comes standard with features like remote mobile app access and Trip Planner. The introduction of the Model Y Standard aims to revitalize Tesla's sales amidst challenges from competitors and market factors.

articles.title: Why the MG U9 Will Rewrite Australia's Stale Dual Cab Ute Segment
articles.author: Ben McKimm
articles.summary: MG Motor has launched the MG U9 Ute in Australia, with prices starting at AUD$52,990. The Ute is available in Explore, Explore X, and Explore Pro variants, featuring a diesel powertrain, multi-link rear suspension, and advanced technology such as dual 12.3-inch screens and an electric tailgate on the Explore Pro model.

articles.title: Maya Bagel Express Opens Second Location in Louisville to Rave Reviews
articles.author: Hollywood Life
articles.summary: Maya Bagel Express is expanding by opening a second location in Louisville, Kentucky. This new location, reflecting high demand, will offer the same fresh, made-from-scratch menu items, including classic and creative bagel flavors, breakfast sandwiches, and lunch options. The expansion follows Maya Bagel Express's success since its launch in 2022.

articles.title: Samsung Confirms Surprising Galaxy Z Fold7 Offer
articles.author: Forbes
articles.summary: Samsung is promoting the Galaxy Z Fold 7 and Galaxy Z Flip 7 in the US. They are offering a two-step special offer that includes discounts and extra storage for US customers.

articles.title: If You've Always Wanted To Try K-Beauty, Here's Your Chance Thanks To These 33 Fall Prime Day Deals
articles.author: Daniel Boan
articles.summary: Amazon is holding Prime Big Deal Days sale and offering discounts on various products. Some notable deals include 45% off Mixsoon Bean Essence, 37% off The Face Shop cleansing oil, 30% off TirTir cushion foundation and Kahi Wrinkle Bounce Hydrating Multi-Balm. Also, discounts are available on Biodance Bio-Collagen Real Deep Mask, Laneige Lip Sleeping Mask and Dr.Jart+ Cicapair Intensive Soothing Repair Cream, alongside deals from The Saem, Cosrx, Mise En Scéne, Anua, Beauty of Joseon, Tonymoly, Medicube, Mediheal, Dr. Althea, Dear, Klairs, Some by Mi, Meditherapy, Banila Co, I Dew Care, Torriden, Fwee, Peripera, Skin Food, Glow Recipe.

articles.title: Shop Fran Drescher-Approved Laura Geller Makeup During Amazon Prime Day
articles.author: Clara Mcmahon
articles.summary: Laura Geller New York is offering discounts on its makeup products during Amazon Prime Big Deal Days. The sale includes items like the Spackle Skin-Perfecting Primer with SPF 30, Baked Balance-n-Brighten Powder Foundation, and Modern Classic Lipstick, with additional promotions available on palettes and other beauty essentials. Fran Drescher endorses the brand and highlights the suitability of these products for women of all ages.

articles.title: Samsung Confirms Surprising Galaxy Z Fold7 Offer
articles.author: Ewan Spence
articles.summary: Samsung is offering discounts on the Galaxy Z Fold7 and Galaxy Z Flip7 in the US, including a flat discount of $350 and $250 respectively, and a free storage upgrade to 512GB at the price of the 256GB model. Both models also include a six-month free subscription to Google AI Pro.

articles.title: Cheerios debuts never-before-seen cereal featuring an exciting 'twist' on family favourite
articles.author: GB News
articles.summary: Nestlé Cereals is launching Very Berry Cheerios, a new berry variant of its Cheerios brand, blended with real berry puree. This marks the first new product launch for Cheerios in nearly three years.

articles.title: Corsair EX300U SSD review: 10Gbps USB performance with a MagSafe magnet
articles.author: PC World
articles.summary: The EX300U is a new SSD featuring a small form-factor and MagSafe magnetic mounting. It offers 10Gbps performance, making it suitable for use with MagSafe-compatible devices.

articles.title: Lazy Genius Official Disrupts Beauty Industry with Ethics-First Approach and Legal Justice Mission
articles.author: Get News
articles.summary: Lazy Genius Official, a new beauty brand, has launched. It combines cruelty-free cosmetics with a focus on social impact.

articles.title: Dreame L10 robot vacuum marked down by staggering 64 per cent this Prime Big Deal Days: ‘Transformative'
articles.author: Sophie Haslett
articles.summary: Dreame has introduced the L10s Ultra Gen2 Robot Vacuum and Mop. This vacuum boasts enhanced capabilities for reaching tight spaces, edge cleaning, and powerful suction, along with features like automatic dust collection, mop cleaning, and water refilling. It is currently available on Amazon Australia with a significant discount as part of the Prime Big Deal Day promotion.

articles.title: Starlink Mini launched in Sarawak, combining high-performance internet with portability
articles.author: BP 6
articles.summary: PC Image launched the Starlink Mini, a portable satellite internet device developed by SpaceX. This lightweight device, priced at RM930 with monthly plans from RM220, offers high-speed, low-latency internet access for users on the go. It's managed via the Starlink app and supports roaming within the registered country.

articles.title: New world of potential: JKCG Auto unveils DENZA
articles.summary: John Keells CG Auto is launching DENZA, a luxury electric vehicle brand, in Sri Lanka. Pre-bookings are open for three models: the DENZA D9, DENZA B8, and DENZA B5, with the official launch scheduled soon. This launch marks JKCG Auto's commitment to sustainable mobility in Sri Lanka.

articles.title: Google AI Mode gets Search Live, adds support for seven Indian languages
articles.author: Indian Express
articles.summary: Google is updating its AI Model by introducing a new feature called Search.

articles.title: China's Zeekr 001 takes 7 minutes to charge from 10% to 80%
articles.author: Toronto Sun
articles.summary: Pirelli will fit Aston Martins with its Bluetooth-enabled 'Cyber Tire.' Stellantis has developed a new battery architecture boasting increased power in a smaller package. Huawei has integrated 43 speakers into its luxury Chinese sedan.

articles.title: PingCAP Launches TiDB X and New AI Capabilities at SCaiLE Summit 2025
articles.author: Nasdaq Globe Newswire
articles.summary: TiDB introduces a new architecture that delivers context-aware, zero-friction scaling and native AI support. This new architecture represents an update or enhancement to the TiDB platform.

articles.title: Hunting launches Opti-TEK™: Smarter, Safer Well Interventions at the upcoming ADIPEC and ICoTA Europe exhibitions
articles.author: Oilfield Technology
articles.summary: Hunting PLC has launched Opti-TEK™, a new suite of Optimised tools.

articles.title: Google's AI try-on imagines your feet in new shoes
articles.author: The Verge
articles.summary: Google will introduce an AI-powered 'try it on' feature for shoes on Google Shopping. This feature allows users to virtually try on new heels, sneakers, or sandals while browsing online.

articles.title: New In-N-Out Burger location opening in Sylmar
articles.summary: In-N-Out Burger will open a new restaurant location in Sylmar. The grand opening date has not yet been disclosed.

articles.title: "Domino's Pizza is about to look - and sound - a lot different" This is not the flex they think it is
articles.summary: Domino's is facing criticism, with users commenting on its pizza's taste and branding updates. Some express a preference for other pizza brands over Domino's.

articles.title: 324 Washington Street Archives
articles.summary: Apollo Bagels has launched its first location in New Jersey, specifically in Hoboken. This marks the introduction of their service to a new market.
